title: How to Make a Cardigan Cushion

steps.headline: Spread the cardigan out on a table.
steps.description: Move the arms to the sides.

steps.headline: Place the cushion insert onto the cardigan.
steps.description: Center it as much as you can.

steps.headline: Mark the placement of the cushion insert with sewing pins.
steps.description: However, don't place the pins exactly against the cushion insert; instead, measure about 2cm/1" around the cushion insert and mark this with pins. This extra edge is important for working with as you make the cushion. Use a measuring tape to help you get the measurement as accurate as possible all the way around the insert.

steps.headline: Cut out around the pinned shape, both front and back of the cardigan.
Stitch around the whole cushion shape.
steps.description: Stitch all of the edges using running stitch. Stitch around twice, to ensure that it cannot unravel.

steps.headline: Unbutton the front side of the cushion square.
steps.description: Turn it back the right way around. The seams should face inward. Use your fingertips to push out the corners to make the cushion cover as square as possible.

steps.headline: Insert the cushion insert and button the cardigan cover back in place.
Plump the cushion insert to fit properly.
steps.description: All done; you now have a lovely cardigan cushion for your comfort and display.

text: Turn the cardigan inside out.  Spread the cardigan out on a table. Move the arms to the sides. Place the cushion insert onto the cardigan. Center it as much as you can. Mark the placement of the cushion insert with sewing pins. However, don't place the pins exactly against the cushion insert; instead, measure about 2cm/1" around the cushion insert and mark this with pins. This extra edge is important for working with as you make the cushion. Use a measuring tape to help you get the measurement as accurate as possible all the way around the insert. Cut out around the pinned shape, both front and back of the cardigan. This forms the cushion cover. Stitch around the whole cushion shape. Stitch all of the edges using running stitch. Stitch around twice, to ensure that it cannot unravel. Unbutton the front side of the cushion square. Turn it back the right way around. The seams should face inward. Use your fingertips to push out the corners to make the cushion cover as square as possible. Insert the cushion insert and button the cardigan cover back in place.  Plump the cushion insert to fit properly. All done; you now have a lovely cardigan cushion for your comfort and display.
